frameDefinitions: A Fugitive avoids recapture by or on the authority of Authorities in relation to a Crime which the Fugitive has committed or is suspected of having committed.
This frame contains words for individuals, i.e. humans, who are governed by virtue of being registered in a certain Jurisdiction.
An Event takes place at a Place and Time.
A Combatant is declared or loyal to a Side in a military Conflict.
This frame contains words for individuals, i.e. humans, with respect to their Religion.
A Theme is held in captivity by an Agent or Cause.
frameExamples: He is in fact a <t>fugitive</t> of the law and you must inform the police if you see him.
Big earthquakes only <t>happen</t> along plate boundaries. INI
A 20-year=old Argentinian <t>guerilla</t> was firing at our squad.
The bells call the <t><fex name='Person'>faithful</fex></t> to evensong DNI
Twenty soldiers were in <t>captivity</t> for over a month before they were released
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Fugitive</fen> has escaped and/or is evading capture by law enforcement <fen>Authorities</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Fugitive</fen> is evading law enforcement.
This role identifies the general <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Fugitive</fen> is located.
Name of the event which occurs.
The <fen>Combatant</fen> is the human being involved in combat.
The religious belief system that the <fen>Person</fen> follows.
The area within which the <fen>Theme</fen> is confined.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Theme</fen> is held captive.
This role identifies the general <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Theme</fen> is held captive.
listRoleExamples: Only two years earlier <fex>she</fex> had been on the lam from charges of embezzlement.
He was a fugitive <fex>in the early 1990s</fex>.
Sloan, on the lam <fex>in Michigan</fex> for the last five months, is due to appear in court this Monday.
<fex>He</fex> was in captivity for six days.
The captives <fex>in the next room</fex> were fed well but otherwise ignored.

passageCandidateSpans.text: Tibetan Uprising Day Tibetan Uprising Day
